property.name: custom_feature
property.doc: custom_feature_init_tbls_to_zero='0' or '1' if 1 will force zeroing memories in pcid and emulation. Default - '0'

property.name: custom_feature
property.doc: custom_feature_mem_reset_mode='INDIRECT'/'DMA'/'NONE' Method to reset tables which are not listed in table 'default'. 'NONE' will not reset those memories.

property.name: custom_feature
property.doc: custom_feature_mem_defaults_verify='0' or '1' if 1 will verify all memories initilized during init sequence Default - '0'

property.name: custom_feature
property.doc: Set to boot with access only.

property.name: sw_state_max_size
property.doc: Configures the size of memory to be pre allocated for sw state. The valid range is 0-1000000000 (i.e up to 1TB).

property.name: stable_location
property.doc: Specify the stable cache option for Warm Boot operations.

property.name: stable_size
property.doc: Specify the stable cache size in bytes used for Warm boot operations.

property.name: stable_filename
property.doc: file system will be used to save the stable cache data with this filename

property.name: mem_cache_enable
property.doc: Shadow all memory with ecc field or not.

property.name: mem_cache_enable
property.doc: Shadow all memory with parity field or not.

property.name: mem_cache_enable
property.doc: Enable memory shadow for specific table.

property.name: mem_nocache
property.doc: Disable memory shadow for specific table.

property.name: pci_cmc
property.doc: Specify the CMC in CMICx used by the PCI Host.

property.name: pci_cmcs_num
property.doc: Specify the number of CMCs used by the PCI Host.
